resources.string: The password must have at least 8 characters and contain uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters.

Please do not display in public places (to prevent others from taking pictures) and do not take screenshots (to prevent the operating system from backing up photos to the cloud). Doing so may result in severe and irreversible security risks.

The request to lock your wallet has been submitted. Once confirmed on-chain, your wallet\’s assets will be frozen. You can then use the wallet recovery feature to regain access.

Your wallet is locked. More than half of your Guardians are required to unlock your wallet.
Once trusted, you can transfer unlimited Ethereum L1 assets to this contact. Your daily quota will no longer apply.
Once removed, transfers to this contact will count towards your daily quota.
Your Guardians can lock/unlock your wallet and help recover it in the event your mobile device is lost or stolen.
Once removed, this address can no longer help you recover your wallet or protect you.
Do you want to lock the wallet?
Once locked, the wallet\’s assets are frozen. Please confirm the wallet owner is the one requesting help to freeze the assets.
Do you want to unlock the wallet?
This should be used when the owner of the wallet asked you to unlock their assets.

As a Guardian, you use a Loopring Wallet

2 Tap Profile > Manage Guardians > Who I Protect

3 Find the request by the person you protect

4 Approve

2. Find the request by the person you protect in the approval record list

3. Approve

Your wallet is very secure; you are in control of your assets. Guardians are people or devices you choose as part of your \'security team\'. It is best practice to have at least 3 Guardians.
Your wallet is secure. \nBest practice calls for at least 3 Guardians. Add more Guardians to improve your security.
Your wallet is not secure. Please add more Guardians as soon as possible.

A Guardian should be someone you absolutely trust; it can also be yourself (on another wallet you control). As long as more than half of your Guardians are faithful to you, your assets are safe and can be recovered in the event you lose your device. We recommend adding people you trust (spouse, parents, siblings, children, or friends) and other wallets you control.
You may add other Loopring Wallets as your Guardians to secure your identity and crypto assets. Invite your friends and family to use Loopring Wallet.

Choose how to delete the Guardian

By default, removing a Guardian takes 3 days to go into effect. Alternatively, you can request Guardian approval to remove it immediately. Tap \'Direct Delete\' to remove it in 3 days. Tap \'Approval Delete\' to select your Guardians to approve.

Setting a daily quota increases the security of your wallet by limiting the amount of Ethereum L1 assets that can be sent out within a 24-hour period (unless you \'whitelist\' a special recipient to receive more).
Your future %s transactions will have fees that are %s higher due to a quota being set.
Daily quota has not been set
After closing the daily quota, each transaction fee will be reduced by about 20%. Additionally, there is no limit on Ethereum L1 transfers.
Remove the daily quota %s after it takes effect
Daily quota cannot be set to 0
The quota is the same as the current quota
You are unlocking the wallet. Guardian approval is required.
You are deleting a Guardian. Other Guardians\’ approval is required.
The network fee will also be calculated into the limit. The current transfer amount plus the network fee will exceed the daily quota, and the transfer needs to be approved.

This token is not supported on Loopring L2
Unable to find effective migration information
Hold Assets in Loopring Wallet, Earn Your Share of One Million LRC

1. This program will be active from November 27th (inclusive) to December 26th (inclusive), Beijing time. 30 days.
2. The total mining reward is 1,000,000 LRC, 33,333 LRC each day.
3. You can withdraw LRC, ETH, WBTC, USDT, USDC, and DAI from custodial platforms to Loopring Wallet to join the mining program.
4. To qualify, the total value of your wallet balance shall be no less than 100 USD. Rewards are based on your daily balances.
5. Users who paid to create a wallet (bought a short ENS or 'special' address), OR users who have created a wallet before midnight Beijing time on November 27th will earn a double reward.
6. LRC will earn a double reward.
7. Assets on Loopring 3.6's layer-2 account will earn a double reward.
8. Wallets with three or more Guardians will earn a double reward.
9. The above doubles can be 'stacked' (multiplied) but are capped at 8X. Each wallet's effective participation amount is limited to 800,000 USD.
10. We will randomly select a time every day to take a snapshot and calculate the reward based on your effective participation amount.
11. We will distribute LRC rewards directly to your wallet's layer-2 account the next day.
12. This program only supports Loopring Wallets that are on the new Loopring 3.6 protocol (If you create a wallet before Nov 27th, you can one-click migrate. All wallets created after Nov 27th are on v3.6 by default.) While the spirit of this program is to incentivize users to take control away from CEXs, assets coming from anywhere, including other self-custodial wallets are eligible.
13. Loopring Technology reserves the right to interpret, modify, and cancel this program if necessary.
Participating mining coin: LRC, ETH, USDT, WBTC, USDC and DAI
We will issue LRC rewards directly to your Loopring Wallet\’s L2 account on the next day
Earn your share of one million LRC

Liquidity providers (LPs) earn trading fees from all swaps. Each LP\'s profit is proportional to his/her share of the pool\'s total capital. For selected AMM pools, LPs also earn liquidity mining rewards in LRC and other tokens.

The seed phrase consists of English words. Please write them down and keep them safe.
If the seed phrase gets lost, it cannot be retrieved. Please be sure to back it up safely.
Please write the seed phrase down in order to ensure the backup is correct.

Avoid transferring through internet tools to help prevent attacks by hackers, resulting in irreversible loss of assets. It is recommended to execute a transaction by scanning the wallet\'s QR Code offline.
It is recommended to use professional passcode management tools to store and manage passcodes.

Choose the network to create the wallet
Arbitrum is a Layer 2 solution designed to improve the capabilities of Ethereum smart contracts — boosting their speed and scalability, while adding in additional privacy features to boot.

The Arbitrum compiler takes your Solidity contracts and compiles them to run on Arbitrum. The EthBridge connects Arbitrum-land with Ethereum-land, letting you communicate and pass ether and tokens back and forth. Your Arbitrum code is run by validators, whom you choose. Your contract will run correctly if even one of your chosen validators is honest — that’s the AnyTrust guarantee. All of this can happen quickly and mostly off-chain.

Arbitrum is compatible with Ethereum. Arbitrum makes your DApp scalable, by moving almost all of its activity off-chain and making your DApp\'s cost independent of the size of its code and data. Arbitrum also preserves privacy by letting you choose who gets to see what your DApp is doing. And Arbitrum gives you confidence in your DApp\'s correctness due to the AnyTrust Guarantee which lets you pick your validators and requires only one honest validator to ensure correct behavior.
This address only supports the Arbitrum network. Please don\'t transfer assets to another network.

Loopring Wallet is a smart wallet, and the creation of the wallet needs to call the Ethereum contract. The wallet creation fee is the amount paid to Ethereum network to create the wallet. Loopring doesn’t profit from your creation fee.
Your deposit transaction must be confirmed on the Ethereum mainnet within %s; otherwise, you\’ll lose your assets.
Once the wallet creation fee is accounted for, the remaining assets will be automatically deposited into your wallet\’s Ethereum L1 account.
After your wallet is created, %s. Doing so will delete your private key, and the recovery may be expensive as it requires Ethereum L1 gas fees.

The Counterfactual Wallet is an ultra fast, super cheap, and powerful Ethereum gateway.\n\nThis L2 Wallet harnesses the massive scalability boost that comes with a zk-baked wallet: 100x greater throughput and 100x lower fees.
Try it Before you Buy it

This Loopring L2 wallet bypasses Ethereum L1, saving users from expensive, upfront fees to create the full wallet.\n\nThis allows you, the user, to try the L2 wallet, with limited security features, before you decide to upgrade to the full L1 Smart Wallet.
What if it gets lost or stolen?

If your wallet is lost, stolen or deleted, you are trusting the Official Loopring Guardian to recover your wallet.\n\nIt is important to note that this is a basic security option. It is recommended to use the full Loopring Wallet (L1 + L2), which offers Social Recovery and Guardians in order access the wallet\’s full security potential.
If your wallet is stolen, lost or deleted, you are trusting the Official Loopring Guardian to recover the wallet. A wallet recovery requires an L1 gas fee.
The L2 Wallet does not include Social Recovery or Guardians

If the recipient doesn\'t have an active Loopring L2 account, you will be able to withdraw the token from Loopring L2 to Ethereum L1.\n\nThis process is usually only needed when tokens were sent to a CEX address using Loopring L2. Since the CEX does not have access to the L2 account, this action is required to reclaim the tokens.

·This feature allows a user to move their Loopring L2 tokens to the Ethereum L1 account within the target address. The target address must either be a non-activated L2 account or an exchange address.\n·This operation usually requires more than 30 minutes to take effect, as it needs to interact with Ethereum mainnet. Please be patient.

This address belongs to the Loopring operator for depositing tokens to any Loopring L2 address. If you add this address as a Trusted Contact, there will be no restriction on any of your L2 transfers. Please ensure this is your intention.

Transfers to any Loopring L2 address are routed through the Loopring operator; the operator then sends the tokens to the proper Loopring L2 address. Guardian approval is required if you do not add the Loopring operator as a Trusted Contact.

What is ETH Staking via Lido?

Lido is a liquid staking solution for ETH 2.0 backed by industry-leading staking providers. Lido lets users stake their ETH - without locking assets or maintaining infrastructure.

When using Lido to stake your ETH on the Ethereum beacon chain, users will receive a token (stETH), which represents their ETH on the Ethereum beacon chain on a 1:1 basis. It effectively acts as a bridge bringing ETH 2.0’s staking rewards to ETH 1.0.

WSTETH is the wrapped version of stETH. The total amount of WSTETH doesn’t change after users receive the token. Instead, the token’s value increases over time to reflect ETH staking rewards earned.

It is important to note that users can\'t redeem WSTETH for ETH until phase 2 of Ethereum 2.0. However, users are able to trade WSTETH for ETH on various exchanges at market price.\n\nLoopring will provide a pool to allow users to trade WSTETH for ETH directly on Layer 2. The pool will rebalance periodically when it reaches a specific threshold. If there is not enough inventory on L2, users can always withdraw their WSTETH tokens to Layer 1 and swap for ETH in Lido, Curve, or 1inch.

Your token for investment is locked but still in your account, as Loopring is a DEX.\nWhen the transaction expires, if the Settlement Price is greater than the Target Price, you will get a profit and the frozen token will also be unlocked. If the Settlement Price reaches or is lower than the Target Price, your investment and interest income will be converted into the Target Token at the Target Price.
Subscription Failed. The order has expired.

Dual Investment offers you a chance to sell cryptocurrency high or buy cryptocurrency low at your desired price on your desired date. Once subscribed, users are not able to cancel or redeem the subscription until the Settlement Date.\nYou may be better off holding your cryptocurrency, and may be required to trade your cryptocurrency at a less favorable rate of exchange than the market rate on Settlement Date. Cryptocurrency trading is subject to high market risk. Please make your trades cautiously. There may be no recourse for any losses.
APR is refreshed in real time. We will use the latest APR at the time you complete the subscription successfully.
Target Price is a benchmark price. On Settlement Date, the Settlement Price will be compared against this benchmark price.
I understand that Dual Investment is NOT principal-guaranteed products.
I understand that subscribed assets are locked and users aren\’t able to cancel or redeem before the Settlement Date.

Loopring provides 2 ways of recovering your wallet.
Enabling cloud backup is free. Your private key is encrypted and stored in your Google Drive.
Pay blockchain network fees and recover your wallet with your Guardians.
When you recover your wallet, all of your local data is erased, and you are logged out of your account. The only way to re-login to your account is to recover your wallet.
